snippet: FISCHER--Arthur. The Officers, Governors and Members of the Friars Club deeply mourn the loss of their esteemed Member. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISCHER--Arthur. The Officers, Governors and Members of the Friars Club deeply mourn the loss of their esteemed Member. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his family. 1/3
